title: Bug 120315: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not take effect in the new pdf emitter.
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, the item should be hidden from view. However, currently, the item remains visible even when the display property is set to 'none'.
OB: When previewing the document in PDF format, the label that has its display property set to 'none' is still visible.
EB: When previewing the document in PDF format, the label that has its display property set to 'none' should be hidden and not visible.
SR:
1. Open the document in the new pdf emitter.
2. Set the display property of a label item to 'none'.
3. Preview the document in PDF format.
4. Observe that the label is still visible instead of being hidden.
